Package de.htw.battleship

Class Board

java.lang.Object
de.htw.battleship.Board
public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
Holds the state of one players board as well as the methods to generate a board and process shots.

  • Constructor Details

    • Board

      public Board()
      Create a new Board and generate ships

    • Board

      public Board​(java.lang.String savedBoard, java.util.ArrayList<Ship> savedShips)
      Create a Board and add its ships from an exported string.
      Parameters:
      savedBoard - The saved string representation of the board object
      savedShips - An ArrayList containing the saved ships

  • Method Details

    • stringToShips

      public static java.util.ArrayList<Ship> stringToShips​(java.lang.String savedBoards)
      Parses the ships from the saved string into Ships and returns an ArrayList containing them
      Parameters:
      savedBoards - The saved string containing the ships
      Returns:
      An ArrayList containing all saved ships from the string

    • shoot

      public int shoot​(Vector2d coordinates)
      "Shoots" the given coordinates and checks whether the shot resulted in a HIT, a MISSED_SHOT or even in a sunk ship.
      Parameters:
      coordinates - The Vector2d representing the coordinates being shot at
      Returns:
      The result code of the shot (0: miss/already hit, 1: hit, 2: ship sunk)

    • isShipSunk

      private boolean isShipSunk​(Ship ship)
      Checks whether a ship is sunk and returns the result
      Parameters:
      ship - The ship being checked
      Returns:
      Whether the ship is sunk or not

    • checkSurroundings

      private boolean checkSurroundings​(int x, int y)
      Checks if the field at the given coordinates or any of its surrounding fields contain a SHIP
      Parameters:
      x - The x coordinate of the field being checked
      y - The y coordinate of the field being checked
      Returns:
      Whether the field or any of its surrounding fields contain a ship

    • generateShip

      private Ship generateShip​(int shipLength)
      Generates a new ship at a random position, with a random orientation of the given ship length, that does not intersect or touch any other ship.
      Parameters:
      shipLength - The desired length of the new ship
      Returns:
      A Ship object representing the new ship

    • deactivateLastMove

      public void deactivateLastMove()
      "Deactivates" the last move by replacing it with a Vector2d containing impossible values (values that can not be generated elsewhere in code)

    • print

      public void print​(boolean hideShips)
      Prints the board to System.out
      Parameters:
      hideShips - if TRUE, replaces ships by empty fields in output

    • exportAsString

      public java.lang.String exportAsString()
      Exports the board as one string.
      Returns:
      A string containing the board fields

    • convertShipsToString

      private java.lang.String convertShipsToString()
      Exports the ships as one string.
      Returns:
      A string containing the ship attributes

    • isWholeFleetSunk

      public boolean isWholeFleetSunk()
      Checks if the whole fleet is sunk.
      Returns:
      FALSE if at least one ship is remaining. TRUE otherwise.

    • getField

      public char getField​(int x, int y)
      Gets the value of the field at coordinates x, y
      Parameters:
      x - x coordinate on the board.
      y - y coordinate on the board.
      Returns:
      The value of the specified field.

    • getField

      public char getField​(Vector2d position)
      Gets the value of the field at coordinates x, y
      Parameters:
      position - A Vector2d representing the position of the desired field
      Returns:
      The value of the desired field
